description: They  teamed up with artist Jaime Molina to create a one-of-a-kind ski sock to help you bring more comfort and style to your go-to ski kit. Jaime's love for bold colors and his heritage shine through this sock — bringing art to your performance. And the sock itself offers maximum breathability, durability, and comfort, so you can wear these ski socks time and time again.
name: Smartwool Ski Zero Cushion Memory Quilt Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens
